posts.title: Technically Art: Issue 4 (2023.06.03)
posts.text: Hui! A new article: The Four Vertex Volume: https://t.co/Fzmb9NbW6LAlso features: Laser Knifes! Hope you like it, let me know in the comments!Mentioned: @SebHillaire @Deathreycg torbach#gamedev #vfx #realtimevfx #starwars pic.twitter.com/ccgP8xu849— Simonschreibt (@simonschreibt) April 30, 2023 At #SIGGRAPH 2023 we will show how to extend microfacet theory to handle height-varying roughness and material, in order to derive new BSDFs for asymmetric heightfields such as eroded and damaged surfaces. 1/nhttps://t.co/LU4XRMGQ7v pic.twitter.com/nQylLcSwA5— Eugene d'Eon (@ejdeon) May 2, 2023 UnrealEngineã§ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸€è¦§ã‚’5ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«æ¸¡ã£ã¦blueprintUEã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ä»˜ãã§ã¾ã¨ã‚ã¾ã—ãŸâœğŸ»æš‡ãªæ™‚ã«ã§ã‚‚ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ãã ã•ã„! #UnrealEngine https://t.co/AvjPLswhdi pic.twitter.com/vrpqVM38Ae— daichi_gamedev (@daichi_gamedev) May 2, 2023 I found some free time and revised the cobweb hda. This is a new version that will create the branching setup and work as a pre-process for a simple vellum sim. This will help to emulate tension and achieve more realisitic results. #houdini #gamedev #3d pic.twitter.com/aZQqkdwuEP— Jose_L_Molfino (@Jose_Molfino) May 4, 2023 Slicing ANY mesh (visual) with 2 lines of HLSL.if (dot(worldPos - planePos, planeNorm)) > 0.0 discard (the pixel, or clip alpha) â­•ğŸŒ Mesh back faces can be stencil masked with the plane to 'project' a texture as the clipped surface.#unitytips #unity3d #gamedev #indiedev pic.twitter.com/mKOUN1MQkj— Mirza Beig (@TheMirzaBeig) May 4, 2023 Here's the updated getaway car in-game!#screenshotsaturday #madewithunity #gamedev pic.twitter.com/2tnSdyjuL6— Nick Carver (@NickDCarver) May 6, 2023 gameplay in #UE5 showing a Martian dust devil and mega-storm made with #EmberGen & using basic flipbooks/sprites in-game pic.twitter.com/lZFF1FAc1i— Jason Key (@key_vfx) May 11, 2023 #UnrealEngine 5.2 is out! You've seen how #Niagara Fluids are higher quality, faster, can be cached, and have engine-integrated lighting. We also redesigned the user interface so they are far easier to use, and wrote extensive documentationhttps://t.co/ed1rePsvmmTry it out! pic.twitter.com/ZQAbY181yC— Devon Penney (@dmpvfx) May 12, 2023 the evolution of the God of War â›“ï¸ pic.twitter.com/5PPHy0h8ex— Sony (@Sony) May 12, 2023 Ever wondered how water works in video games? As it turns out, there's a ton of smoke and mirrors in the background, without anyone ever realizing it.---> another huge ğŸ§µ pic.twitter.com/8QmBmMg4B6— Thomas @ Stylized Station (@StylizedStation) May 13, 2023 Ever wondered how grass is made in video games? Making grass may seem simple, but theres actually a lof of history and technology behind this surprisingly complex topic. Another big thread ğŸ§µ pic.twitter.com/Zbc6zrmgVz— Thomas @ Stylized Station (@StylizedStation) May 15, 2023 I'm excited to release this new project I've been working on for the past few months, focusing on the new UE5.2 substrate material ! #gamedev #UnrealEngine5 #indiedev pic.twitter.com/2p8UgLMPzC— Corentin Demougeot (@UTCompiler) May 15, 2023 I've given my little Tech Art course now 5 times (3x via Zoom, 2x in person) and the feedback was nice. I've summarized the content on this page, just in case someone else is interested in this course:â–¶ https://t.co/2UUqWQMmb1#gamedev #techart #realtimevfx #teaching pic.twitter.com/HTM4SRAYt3— Simonschreibt (@simonschreibt) May 15, 2023 making a perspective camera match an orthographic camera ğŸ¥orthographic cameras can be thought of as a special case where FoV = 0 - the trick is to decide what to keep fixed when changing FoV. in this case, I fix the near clip heighttry it out here: https://t.co/pn1OLSybIH pic.twitter.com/ykWTGFbQgE— Freya HolmÃ©r (@FreyaHolmer) May 15, 2023 I didn't really need any math for my past projects, which was a bonus since me and math have a rough relationship. But as I'm progressing in my game developer journey, I'm back again watching this video series. It is absolute gold. I recommend everyone to watch it. https://t.co/eikEQYYZnB— Kris (@thatDevKris) May 15, 2023 Introducing "FFX Geometry Explainer" - the ultimate tool for Houdini educators & learners! Simplify complex concepts & visualize Geometry Components / Attribute Classes effortlessly. https://t.co/uV5uITssHF#GeometryExplainer #Houdini #HoudiniHDA #EducationalTool #fendrafx pic.twitter.com/97At0liTsp— David Torno (@aeioweyou) May 15, 2023 The tutorial area is a controlled environment where you can learn all the game's mechanics and swim around with some fish pic.twitter.com/2NTlTb1SFV— Khena B (@Khena_B) May 14, 2023 Here is our #SIGGRAPH2023 paper on initializing hybrid hair simulations to prevent sagging when the simulation begins with my PhD student @JerryHsu32 and collaborators at Tencent, Tongtong Wang, Zherong Pan, Xifeng Gao, and @kui_wu:https://t.co/y01rwkAbew pic.twitter.com/xZ7GN8mTs0— Cem Yuksel (@cem_yuksel) May 16, 2023 testing out more #simulationnodes ideas. Purely 2d simulation faked to 3d but could work in many scenes. Whitewater particles modified from the blender demo file. #geometrynodes #b3d pic.twitter.com/tPegg6mmTR— Miettinen Jesse - Blenderesse (@JesseMiettinen) May 18, 2023 Car controller looking good ğŸ‘#madewithunity pic.twitter.com/oxoW0CMWDa— Alex Ameye (@alexanderameye) May 18, 2023 In a recent interview by @80Level they had an in-depth coverage of my workflow, in which I tried to succinctly break down the process for this portrait and some of the challenges I had to overcome from start to finish.https://t.co/VPz1y0YIxd#ZBrush #Maya #XGen #ArnoldRender pic.twitter.com/PDV9wggPBw— Hadi Karimi (@HadiKarimi_Art) May 18, 2023 I wrote a blog post on creating render targets for shaders, but without the render target camera overhead.Read it here: https://t.co/DXsfz5KSZu!#gamedev #ue5 #ue4 #unrealengine #tutorial— Celeste Neukirchen (@CatherineCel) May 23, 2023 Finally achieved some fluid simulations in Geometry nodes. posts.text: â­FREE WATER MATERIALâ­As I said, here it is! You can download for free this stylized water shader I made for my projects in UE5ğŸŒŠâœ¨I hope you like it!
